message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but how about a 60/40 split in my favor?  Time is money, after all!
Okay, Bob, I'll offer you 45. It's a compromise, but we can't keep going back and forth forever.  Let's wrap this up.
Alice, I'm willing to settle this for 55/45.  This seems like a fair deal considering the time pressure.
